Package com.api.hub.ai.cache

Interface CacheOperations<K,V>

Type Parameters:
K - the type of keys maintained by this cache operation
V - the type of mapped values
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCacheOperations, InMemoryCache, SimpleCacheHandler
public interface CacheOperations<K,V>
Defines operations for synchronizing cache data with an underlying persistent or distributed cache source in the AI-Agent Execution and Orchestration Platform.

This interface separates the responsibilities of the low-level cache synchronization logic from the business-level cache usage represented by Cache. It is primarily used to handle interaction with the actual cache backend or external cache servers (e.g., Redis, NoSQL, distributed caches).

Implementations of this interface are responsible for:

  • Loading data from the source cache system into memory.
  • Writing updates back to the source cache or persistent store.
  • Refreshing cached data based on configurable policies or triggers.
  • Clearing or resetting cache content when required.
  • Maintaining timestamps for the last refresh to optimize sync frequency.
  • Notifying handlers about changes to specific cache keys.

Within the AI-agent framework, the cache synchronization mechanism ensures that agent environment states, histories, and variables remain consistent and performant across multiple distributed components or instances.

See Also:

  • InMemoryCache

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    clear()
    Clears or resets the cache contents completely.
    long
    getLastRefreshTime()
    Returns the timestamp (in milliseconds) of the last successful cache refresh operation.
    void
    notifyCacheHandler(K key)
    Notifies or triggers cache handlers or listeners about an update to the cache entry identified by the specified key.
    boolean
    refresh()
    Refreshes the cache content, possibly by reloading or syncing data from the external source.
    boolean
    sink(K key)
    Persists or syncs the cache entry identified by the given key back to the external cache or persistent store.
    boolean
    source()
    Loads or initializes the cache data from the external source.

  • Method Details

    • source

      boolean source()
      Loads or initializes the cache data from the external source.
      Returns:
      true if the source load was successful; false otherwise

    • sink

      boolean sink(K key)
      Persists or syncs the cache entry identified by the given key back to the external cache or persistent store.
      Parameters:
      key - the key identifying the cache entry to sync
      Returns:
      true if the sink operation was successful; false otherwise

    • refresh

      boolean refresh()
      Refreshes the cache content, possibly by reloading or syncing data from the external source.
      Returns:
      true if the refresh was successful; false otherwise

    • clear

      boolean clear()
      Clears or resets the cache contents completely.
      Returns:
      true if the clear operation was successful; false otherwise

    • getLastRefreshTime

      long getLastRefreshTime()
      Returns the timestamp (in milliseconds) of the last successful cache refresh operation.
      Returns:
      last refresh time as a long value representing epoch millis

    • notifyCacheHandler

      void notifyCacheHandler(K key)
      Notifies or triggers cache handlers or listeners about an update to the cache entry identified by the specified key.
      Parameters:
      key - the key whose change should be notified
